meaningMnemonic:
Quite the <kanji>scene</kanji>, this <kanji>view</kanji> is. So what you're looking at is a <vocabulary>landscape</vocabulary>. This often refers to a <vocabulary>cityscape</vocabulary> or the general <vocabulary>scenery</vocabulary> of an area.

This is a formal word that’s commonly used in the context of urban planning or environmental design.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
